```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r}
library(leaflet)
library(ggplot2)
library(rgdal)
library(dplyr)
library(sf)
library(gpclib)
library(maptools)
library(ggpolypath)
```

```{r}
mypal <- colorNumeric(
  palette = "magma",
  domain = SummerPRECIP_2016_2017_MeanMap$MeanPRECIP
)

mypal(c(10, 20, 30, 40, 50))
```


```{r}
leaflet() %>%
  addProviderTiles(providers$Stamen.TonerLite) %>%
  addPolygons(data = SummerPRECIP_2016_2017_MeanMap,
              color = ~mypal(MeanPRECIP),
              weight = 0.5,
              smoothFactor = 0.2,
              fillOpacity = 0.5,
              label = ~MeanPRECIP) %>%
  addLegend(
    position = "bottomleft",
    pal = mypal,
    values = SummerPRECIP_2016_2017_MeanMap$'MeanPRECIP',
    title = "Median Population Income Across VA Counties"
  )
```
